name: Nick In Time
description:
Play with time as you warp back and forth between rifts and manipulate time to explore a time and reality distorted world.

Controls:

A, D or Left, Right = movement
W, Up = jump
Q = Quantum Time Rift placement
R = Rift jump
F = Forward to next Rift
Mouse wheel up/down = forward/reverse time of selected object
